languages.text: "Ввиду происходящего, ваш визит — настоящее благословение. Видите ли, Янус не имеет собственного флота. Мы могли бы организовать поиски планетарного масштаба, будь в нашем распоряжении корабли... такие, как у вашего сиятельства! Быть может, вы найдете возможность поддержать своих подданных, оказавшихся в беде? Уверена, даже примерных координат будет достаточно, чтобы организовать слаженную работу наземных сил и корабельного экипажа в поисках супостатов!"

"Considering what has occurred, your visit is a true blessing. You see, Janus does not have its own fleet. We could organise a planet-wide search, if we had ships at our disposal... ships like yours, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Perhaps you will find a way to support your subjects in their hour of need? I'm sure even approximate coordinates would be sufficient to have the ground forces and ship's crew work together to hunt down the enemy!"
languages.original_text: "Ввиду происходящего, ваш визит — настоящее благословение. Видите ли, Янус не имеет собственного флота. Мы могли бы организовать поиски планетарного масштаба, будь в нашем распоряжении корабли... такие, как у вашего сиятельства! Быть может, вы найдете возможность поддержать своих подданных, оказавшихся в беде? Уверена, даже примерных координат будет достаточно, чтобы организовать слаженную работу наземных сил и корабельного экипажа в поисках супостатов!"

I'm sure even approximate coordinates would be sufficient to have the ground forces and ship's crew work together to hunt down the enemy!"

I'm sure even approximate coordinates would be sufficient to have the ground forces and ship's crew work together to hunt down the enemy!"

languages.text: “考虑到目前发生的事情，您的来访真的是场及时雨。如您所见，加努斯没有自己的舰队。如果我们也有可以用的飞船……比如您的飞船，大人，我们就可以对整颗行星进行搜查！或许您可以找到办法，在您的臣民需要的时候协助他们？我相信，哪怕仅仅是提供大致的坐标，也足以让地面部队与船员携手合作，一起消灭敌人！”
languages.original_text: "Considering what has occurred, your visit is a true blessing. You see, Janus does not have its own fleet. We could organise a planet-wide search, if we had ships at our disposal... ships like yours, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Perhaps you will find a way to support your subjects in their hour of need? I'm sure even approximate coordinates would be sufficient to have the ground forces and ship's crew work together to hunt down the enemy!"

traits.locale_text: “考虑到目前发生的事情，您的来访真的是场及时雨。如您所见，加努斯没有自己的舰队。如果我们也有可以用的飞船……比如您的飞船，大人，我们就可以对整颗行星进行搜查！或许您可以找到办法，在您的臣民需要的时候协助他们？我相信，哪怕仅仅是提供大致的坐标，也足以让地面部队与船员携手合作，一起消灭敌人！”

languages.text: «Viendo lo sucedido, su visita es una auténtica bendición. Verá, Janus no tiene flota propia. Podríamos ordenar un registro a escala planetaria si tuviéramos algunas naves... ¡Naves como la suya, mi{mf|lord|lady}! ¿Podría ayudar a sus súbditos en su hora más aciaga? ¡Unas simples coordenadas aproximadas bastarían para que las fuerzas terrestres y la tripulación de la nave dieran caza al enemigo!».
languages.original_text: "Considering what has occurred, your visit is a true blessing. You see, Janus does not have its own fleet. We could organise a planet-wide search, if we had ships at our disposal... ships like yours, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Perhaps you will find a way to support your subjects in their hour of need? I'm sure even approximate coordinates would be sufficient to have the ground forces and ship's crew work together to hunt down the enemy!"

traits.locale_text: «Viendo lo sucedido, su visita es una auténtica bendición. Verá, Janus no tiene flota propia. Podríamos ordenar un registro a escala planetaria si tuviéramos algunas naves... ¡Naves como la suya, mi{mf|lord|lady}! ¿Podría ayudar a sus súbditos en su hora más aciaga? ¡Unas simples coordenadas aproximadas bastarían para que las fuerzas terrestres y la tripulación de la nave dieran caza al enemigo!».

languages.text: 「今起きていることを思えば、陛下の訪問はまさに恩寵です。ご存知のとおり、ヤヌスは独自の軍隊を持っていません。惑星広域調査団を組織するには、自由に使える宇宙船が必要です…陛下のように！もしや、困難にあえぐ臣下を支援する手立てをお考えでしょうか？おおよその座標であっても、地上部隊と船の乗組員で協働して敵を追討するには十分かと！」
languages.original_text: "Considering what has occurred, your visit is a true blessing. You see, Janus does not have its own fleet. We could organise a planet-wide search, if we had ships at our disposal... ships like yours, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Perhaps you will find a way to support your subjects in their hour of need? I'm sure even approximate coordinates would be sufficient to have the ground forces and ship's crew work together to hunt down the enemy!"

traits.locale_text: 「今起きていることを思えば、陛下の訪問はまさに恩寵です。ご存知のとおり、ヤヌスは独自の軍隊を持っていません。惑星広域調査団を組織するには、自由に使える宇宙船が必要です…陛下のように！もしや、困難にあえぐ臣下を支援する手立てをお考えでしょうか？おおよその座標であっても、地上部隊と船の乗組員で協働して敵を追討するには十分かと！」

languages.text: "Angesichts der Vorfälle ist Euer Besuch ein wahrer Segen. Ihr müsst wissen, Janus hat keine eigene Flotte. Wir könnten eine planetenweite Suche organisieren, wenn wir Schiffe hätten ... Schiffe wie Eures, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Vielleicht findet Ihr einen Weg, Eure Untertanen in ihrer Stunde der Not zu unterstützen? Ich bin sicher, selbst ungefähre Koordinaten würden ausreichen, damit Bodentruppen und Schiffscrew zusammenarbeiten und den Feind zur Strecke bringen könnten!"
languages.original_text: "Considering what has occurred, your visit is a true blessing. You see, Janus does not have its own fleet. We could organise a planet-wide search, if we had ships at our disposal... ships like yours, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Perhaps you will find a way to support your subjects in their hour of need? I'm sure even approximate coordinates would be sufficient to have the ground forces and ship's crew work together to hunt down the enemy!"

traits.locale_text: "Angesichts der Vorfälle ist Euer Besuch ein wahrer Segen. Ihr müsst wissen, Janus hat keine eigene Flotte. Wir könnten eine planetenweite Suche organisieren, wenn wir Schiffe hätten ... Schiffe wie Eures, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Vielleicht findet Ihr einen Weg, Eure Untertanen in ihrer Stunde der Not zu unterstützen? Ich bin sicher, selbst ungefähre Koordinaten würden ausreichen, damit Bodentruppen und Schiffscrew zusammenarbeiten und den Feind zur Strecke bringen könnten!"

languages.text: « D'ailleurs, votre visite est une véritable aubaine. Janus n'a pas sa propre flotte, voyez-vous. Nous pourrions organiser des recherches sur toute la planète, si nous avions des vaisseaux à notre disposition... Des vaisseaux comme le vôtre, Votre Seigneurie ! Puis-je espérer que vous trouverez le moyen d'aider vos sujets dans le besoin ? Je suis sûre que des coordonnées approximatives suffiraient à votre équipage pour traquer l'ennemi en coopération avec nos troupes terrestres ! »
languages.original_text: "Considering what has occurred, your visit is a true blessing. You see, Janus does not have its own fleet. We could organise a planet-wide search, if we had ships at our disposal... ships like yours, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Perhaps you will find a way to support your subjects in their hour of need? I'm sure even approximate coordinates would be sufficient to have the ground forces and ship's crew work together to hunt down the enemy!"

traits.locale_text: « D'ailleurs, votre visite est une véritable aubaine. Janus n'a pas sa propre flotte, voyez-vous. Nous pourrions organiser des recherches sur toute la planète, si nous avions des vaisseaux à notre disposition... Des vaisseaux comme le vôtre, Votre Seigneurie ! Puis-je espérer que vous trouverez le moyen d'aider vos sujets dans le besoin ? Je suis sûre que des coordonnées approximatives suffiraient à votre équipage pour traquer l'ennemi en coopération avec nos troupes terrestres ! »

languages.text: "Yaşananların üstüne ziyaretiniz gerçekten ilaç gibi olacak. Bildiğiniz gibi Janus, kendi filosuna sahip değil. Emrimizde birkaç gemi olsaydı gezegen çapında bir arama gerçekleştirebilirdik. Sizinkiler gibi gemiler {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Tebaanıza bu zor zamanlarında destek olmayı düşünmez miydiniz? Kara kuvvetleri ile gemi mürettebatının iş birliği içinde düşmanı avlaması için takribi koordinatları bilmek dahi yeterli olacaktır!"
languages.original_text: "Considering what has occurred, your visit is a true blessing. You see, Janus does not have its own fleet. We could organise a planet-wide search, if we had ships at our disposal... ships like yours, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Perhaps you will find a way to support your subjects in their hour of need? I'm sure even approximate coordinates would be sufficient to have the ground forces and ship's crew work together to hunt down the enemy!"

traits.locale_text: "Yaşananların üstüne ziyaretiniz gerçekten ilaç gibi olacak. Efendim, Janus'un kendi filosu yok. Emrimizde birkaç gemi olsaydı gezegen çapında bir arama gerçekleştirebilirdik. Sizinkiler gibi gemiler {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Tebaanıza bu zor zamanlarında destek olmayı düşünmez miydiniz? Kara kuvvetleri ile gemi mürettebatının iş birliği içinde düşmanı avlaması için takribi koordinatları bilmek dahi yeterli olacaktır!"
